info.name: Hide back/forward in maximized window (FX 42+)
info.description: This userstyle hides back and forward buttons in a maximized Firefox window, meant to be used with extensions that provide alternative ways of using them, like MileWideBack or EdgeWise.
info.additionalInfo:
My first userstyle!

Changelog:
01.07.17: Improved reliability, removed duplicate code, userChrome.css format
08.09.13: Initial version
